about_the_game:
If you are interested in War of Wizards, don't forget to wishlist and follow us!


You can also find us in our community:




War of Wizards is a competitive VR MOBA game that combines unique spell-casting mechanics and tower defense strategies to bring you a VR experience like no other.

In War of Wizards, you don't just cast spells - you draw them with your VR controllers! And their power is fully determined by how you draw them! With prompts in-game, you don't need to remember the spells - you just need to focus on the strategy.

As a wizard player, you'll enter epic magic battles where every move counts. With a mission to destroy the enemy wizard's crystal while protecting your own, you need to carefully build your magic deck, quickly respond to changes on the battlefield, use the best spell counter at the right moment and lead your minions to victory!

With the option to play against strangers, friends, or AI bots, every match is a new and exciting adventure, which will keep you engaged and entertained for hours!

Key features:
- Tower defense gameplay that rewards quick thinking, strategic planning, time management, and leadership
- Unique spell-casting mechanics that let you feel like a true master of magic
- Magic power determined by the size and accuracy of the spells you draw
- Dodge enemy attacks with your body movements
- Balanced spell repertoire for you to explore and experiment
- Fancy avatars and wands for you to stand out
- Multiple game modes - challenge your friends, players in online matches, players in our discord community or different levels of AI bots
- Continuous updates & support!

Draw to cast spells, unlock your magic talents, and dominate the battlefield TODAY!

name: War of Wizards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3072 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3072 MB available space

short_description: Draw & cast your spells! Sharpen your magic skills with other players in VR! War of Wizards is a competitive VR MOBA game, where you fight in battles with other players by drawing magic spells. The bigger and more accurate you draw them, the stronger they are!
